title: TTMMSTYLUS - Wear watch face
summary: TTMMSTYLUS watch face app for Android Wear - simple and minimal
description: TTMMSTYLUS is a simple watch face app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. TTMMSTYLUS is a part of TTMM watchface collection. Have a great TTMM.Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Idea & design : Albert SalamonAndroid programming : Michał Żyliński© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
TTMMSTYLUS is a simple watch face app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. TTMMSTYLUS is a part of TTMM watchface collection. Have a great TTMM.

Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Idea & design : Albert Salamon
Android programming : Michał Żyliński

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
comments: Would be Better if at the top section would be smaller so that 2015 would fit with the date. Also if there was an AM and pm with the time then this would be 5 stars. Would also be cool if it would automatically change different  colors. Also if it display weather info

Looks good but needs more options. Colour is the only option that we can change. It would be nice to be able to change various things about the time/date format. For example displaying the month as "Aug" instead of "08".
Great watch face for my Android Wear. *Update:* woo-hoo. Thanks for the update for transferring the time to the middle. Won't be bothered anymore that card previews are blocking the time.
Nice watch face but can't get into the setup on a Sony sw3 to change colors though, would make it a 5 if I could
Ok. Would like to see the watch time alone have the ability to change to different color and I would 5 star it.
Great app Easy to use and nice looking.
